name: Timmy's Day Out!!
description:
After being developed for months on scratch, you can now play it as an HTML in your browser, for free! Enjoy this top-down perspective adventure game!

This game is Ending-Based, which requires you to restart the game to get each ending. There are 4 main endings and 1 secret ending. If you obtain all 4 main endings, you will unlock the final credits to the game.

Please note: This project will probably not be updated alongside the scratch version, so any bugs will probably not be fixed.

Also note: Clicking the green flag is required to collect all the endings in the game, since the game cannot be restarted after the project was already ran.

Play the game on scratch! https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/683978267/

___________________________________________________

The Story

Timmy and his family are coming back from a family vacation, and take a stop at a gas station. Timmy's parents keep Timmy in the car, until he realizes they left the car door unlocked! Timmy uses this opportunity to go on his own little adventure in the outside world… and gets a little too lost. Timmy finds a missing child poster of himself and realizes his big mistake. Will Timmy be able to find his way home?

__________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

WASD/arrow keys to move

space + touching object to interact

mouse pointer to select options/click target

E to view speedrun timer

T to view which endings you have collected
